title: *Reduced price* 1954 Barndoor micro bus for sale

posts.content:
With a heavy heart I am selling our 1954 van.

The bus is totally standard. LHD German van, this van was lighty restored in the 1980's . Has all original sills, inner and outer, the only repairs done metal wise are 2 lower rear corners, the front lower dog legs have been let in and 1 small patch on cab floor, and that is it!

Has a simple camping interior that we have used as a family. Original running gear and matching numbers except for engine. Running 30HP engine, has original starter handle. Comes with spares to keep you going / 'service' as never intended to sell. Have German paperwork, we believe it was a German police chief personal vehicle.

My idea was to use and then restore to very high standard. Not an early bus but will not find many like this!

£50k, sensible offers considered.

Can we have a price please?

viewtopic.php?f=51&t=104984
I'm surprised this hasn't sold, looks a really nice un-messed with bus.

To appreciate this van you really need to go take a look see.
Why, it's so original and owned by a total nut for all things air cooled, as I recall its all OG underside, you see these buses make silly money then you have to do all the body work, not this one, I personally know this van, if your even thinking about a Barndoor, check this van out.


Ron
